summary: TL- THE CONTACT OWNS A  2012 FORD FIESTA. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHEN ACCELERATING THE VEHICLE SEVERELY SHAKES . THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO A DEALER  WHERE THE TECHNICIAN OBSERVED THE VEHICLE AND WAS UNABLE TO DIAGNOSE A FAILURE. THE MANUFACTURE WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 500 MILES AND THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 27,242 MILES. SR
